summary: This document is an email chain from April 2021 regarding travel arrangements for a federal prosecutor or investigator working on the Epstein/Maxwell case. The travel is for a trip to Colorado, with flight and hotel booking assistance requested from a legal assistant.

persons.name: Ori
persons.context: The individual requesting travel arrangements for the Epstein/Maxwell case, planning to fly from New York to Colorado.

persons.name: Legal Assistant
persons.context: The assistant responding to the travel request, asking for case details and offering to help with flight and hotel arrangements for the Colorado trip.

connections.description: Working relationship where the assistant helps the prosecutor/investigator with travel logistics for a case-related trip.

events.title: Travel Planning for Epstein/Maxwell Case
events.description: A federal prosecutor/investigator requests assistance booking travel to Colorado for work on the Epstein/Maxwell case, with plans to depart in April 2021.

keyFacts: The document confirms active work on the Epstein/Maxwell case was ongoing in April 2021.
A federal prosecutor or investigator was traveling to Colorado for case-related purposes.
The correspondence involves a Legal Assistant from a Public Corruption unit assisting with travel logistics.
